transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir, boliye.
Customer: Haan ji, Rakesh ji, free ho gaye aap?
Executive: Haan ji, boliye sir.
Customer: Haan, sir, pehle to main puchna chahunga system pe available hai ya mobile pe?
Executive: Mobile pe.
Customer: Mobile pe, theek hai sir. IndiaMART ki app open kar lijiye, main aapki thodi notification settings ki hai karwa du.
Executive: Because maine abhi check kiya wo enable nahi hai aur aapka jo notification issue hai usko resolve karte hai.
Executive: Jo aapki buyleads vagerah miss ho rahi hai. Sir, maine ek aur cheez check kari thi aapki buyleads ke regarding ki aapne bilkul sahi kaha, wo cheez aaj ki hi buylead thi jo post hui thi aapke paas aur due to some late issues aapke paas se wo track nahi ho paayi thi jiski vajah se wo deal kisi aur buyer ne consume kar li, kisi aur supplier ne consume kar li, right?
Executive: Sabse pehle apan ye notification issue resolve karte hai aur sir samajhte hai ki isko kaise deal karna hai. Ek baar app, haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maine aapko, sir ek baar app open karke upar se left mein three bar ke options hai us pe tap kariye.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Haan, aaram se kar lijiye, koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Maine app open kiya.
Executive: Haan ji, bilkul theek hai. App open karne ke baad upar aapko three bars dikh rahe honge left mein, top left corner mein.
Customer: Ji kar diya.
Executive: Us pe tap kariye. Haan, uske baad vahan pe aapko account manager ka option dikh raha hoga, customer support ka option. Customer support ka option mein click kar lijiye.
Customer: Customer support, haan.
Executive: Customer support dikh raha hoga, right? Customer support pe tap kariye.
Executive: Us pe tap karne ke baad aapko account manager ka option show ho raha hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Account manager pe tap kariye aur uske baad screen share now ka option show hoga, us pe tap kar dijiye. Aapki screen mujhe show ho jayegi ki app mein aap kahan scroll kar rahe hai to main aapko guide kar paunga easily. To hame video meet ki zarurat nahi padegi, aise hi apan directly contact kar lenge.
Customer: Start kar du?
Executive: Haan ji. Haan.
Customer: Hello. Start ka option.
Executive: Start kar dijiye sir.
Executive: Share screen now pe tap kariye. Haan, aa gaya aapki screen aa rahi hai abhi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To white screen aa rahi hai, kuch issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Maine to share kiya usko.
Executive: Nahi aapne tap screen now pe share rejoin session.
Executive: Phir se ek baar kariega wo end ho gaya aapke end se. Properly wo enable nahi ho paya, start hone se pehle hi end ho gaya.
Executive: Top left three bars pe tap kariye, account, haan.
Executive: Kuch issue aa raha hai, abhi bhi white screen mujhe white screen show ho rahi hai. Chaliye koi baat nahi.
Executive: Main aapko aise hi guide kar dunga. Aapki screen mujhe properly show nahi ho rahi yahan pe. Complete mobile ki white screen show ho rahi hai. Properly connect nahi kar pa raha hai, koi baat nahi hai. Neeche aap neeche scroll karenge sir left bar mein to aapko settings ka option dikhega. Settings mein jaaiye.
Executive: Aur vahan aapko notification setting ka option dikhega.
Customer: Main ne kaha jana pehle?
Executive: Pehle aapko upar left vahi same, same steps hai. Three bar pe tap kariye upar.
Customer: Is pe setting mein notification settings.
Executive: Haan, usme notification settings.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Kaun kaun se option dikhe sir aapko? By lead night notification na?
Customer: Haan, haan, buyleads, buyleads wale pe click kariye, yes yahi wala hai.
Executive: Buylead night, haan.
Executive: Haan, buyleads pe click kariye. Vahan pe aapko show ho raha hoga ki buylead notifications enable hai ki nahi hai, consumption enable hai ki nahi. Sab on hai, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Abhi sir aap computer pe nahi hai warna maine abhi aapka seller panel open kar rakha hai. Usme notifications mein hum settings mein jaate hai. Vahan pe kuch cheeze off hai jo on karni hai. Main apne side se access nahi kar sakta. Wo jab aap computer pe aayenge main tabhi enable kar sakta hu. Notifications mein yahan pe aapke buylead post purchase wala notification ek to off hai aur ek aapka buylead night notification ka option off hai. Ye do options aapke off hai. Ye main aapke enable karwaunga.
Customer: Night notification on kiya tha maine.
Executive: Kiye the aapne, theek hai. Ek sir notification yahan pe off hai, buylead post purchase ka.
Executive: To hota kya hai ki jab aap buylead purchase kar le.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Wo on nahi hai sir. Ye ye disable hai.
Customer: Achcha kar liya aapne? Abhi on kiya.
Executive: Alright sir, alright. Theek hai, alright. Yahan pe abhi ye update ho jayega. Ek second mein isko refresh kar deta hu. Haan sir, enable ho gaya, perfect hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab sir ab ab buylead ki baat kar lete hai sir. Ho kya raha hai aapka jo product line hai sir iska medicines ka aur jo bhi aapke ye injections vagerah ke jo product line hai sir isme na top level competition hai.
Executive: To aapne aaj hi ki buylead consume kari hai, latest buylead consume kari hai but competition itna high hai ki apan seconds mein hone ke baad bhi wo sold out ho ja rahi hai kyunki aur bhi suppliers upar baithe hue hai use consume karne ke liye. To no doubt delay aapko receive hua notification manta hu but ek do seconds ka bhi khel tha but apne ko sir thoda sa active aur hona padega and this ki hum wo notification hum buylead consume kar paye.
Customer: Isse zyada kya active honge ki mobile se aaya aur direct click kiya aur call kiya.
Executive: Sir ab ye dekhiye na kyunki aap bilkul aap sahi keh rahe ho. Bilkul aapne notification pe click kiya wo consume ho gaya that means aap se pehle bhi koi buyer active baitha tha, koi supplier active baitha tha jisne aap se pehle hi second seconds mein wo consume karke baat kar li. No doubt wo hota hai sir kyunki competition itna high chal raha hai aapki product line mein to ye hota hai. Baki ye jo delay wala issue hai ye resolve out maine kar diya hai. Is wale buylead se pehle sir koi issue face hua kisi aur buylead mein ya ye sirf isi buylead ke sang ye same issue face hua tha aapko?
Customer: Generally hota hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ye generally hota hai, sir.
Executive: Achcha generally hota hai? Regular hota hai?
Customer: Haan. Achcha regular hota hai. Aap log ka jo vahan se jo call aate hai usme problem nahi hai. Jo message notification aata hai na usme problem hai.
Executive: Theek hai. To ek kaam kar lete hai sir main aapko regular basis pe, ye aapka WhatsApp number hai sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, aap mujhe apna location issue wo bata dijiye. Location aap locally prefer karte hai Kolkata ke aas paas hi ya all over India mein lete hai buyleads?
Customer: Only Kolkata, Kolkata.
Executive: Sorry? West Bengal, West Bengal.
Executive: West Bengal only na? To ek kaam karta hu main aapko WhatsApp pe jaise hi mujhe buyleads proper dikha karegi main aapko WhatsApp kar diya karunga. Aapke aapke area ke accordingly aur screenshot bhej dunga jisse aap directly us time pe jaake consume kar lenge agar aap let's say online ya available nahi ho paate hai, active nahi ho paate IndiaMART pe. To main usko screenshot leke aapko WhatsApp kar dunga timely aapke West Bengal ke area ki hi buylead. Bas aap mujhe ye bata dijiye ki sabse top selling product kaun sa hai aapka jisme aap buylead consume karte hai aur kitni quantity mein demand karte hai to wo quantity aur uska filter laga ke jo mujhe appropriate buylead dikhegi main aapko uska screenshot timely send kar diya karunga over your WhatsApp. To jab bhi aap active aayenge to aapko screenshot dikhega to aap consume kar lenge. Hota kya hai sir wo technical glitch ki vajah se kabhi kabhi notification issue rehta hai jiski vajah se wo deal aapki miss out ho jati hai to usko prevent karne ke liye main aapko screenshot share kar diya karunga timely.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Right sir? Haan ye hai.
Executive: Haan sir, sorry. Theek hai, theek hai aur aur bataiye sir.
Customer: Guardian hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur aapka ye injections mein influenza vaccine hoga ek to aapka?
Customer: Haan, influenza vaccine hai.
Executive: Hai na? Ek aapne injection bataya mujhe aur ek aapne bataya Rents Renocrit injection, right?
Customer: Haan, Renocrit, Renosafe, [inaudible].
Executive: Theek hai. Isme kitni quantity expect karte hai sir?
Customer: Ye sir ye 5, 5, 10, 15, 20.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap ek kaam kariye abhi apne buyleads ke section mein jaaiye application mein. Ek buylead aapke paas 4 ghante pehle ki aayi hui hai Kolkata, West Bengal se 500 boxes ki Immutel S180 Ace delayed release tablets USP. 2 se 5 lakh.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ye aapke niche hai, okay. Theek hai. Wo sab jo hote hai na unko ekdum higher top wale log deal karte hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir, ek aur aapke paas aayi hai abhi just ek minute pehle 30 mg tablet 1 into 10 tablets ki ek minute pehle West Bengal se hi hai Chandrakona se aur ye sirf khali quantity kam hai iski sirf ek hi script ki aayi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: 2 saal purana buyer hai. Quantity kam hai sir. Haan ye abhi just aayi hai, theek hai. To main aapko ye accordingly share kar diya karunga. Latest buyleads aapke paas aati jaati hai wo vahi wali baate hai sir apan iska time nahi de paate. Highly active hone ke baad bhi sir aur bhi kaam rehte hai. Pura time to IndiaMART ko aap nahi de payenge.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Right sir. Right sir. Main samajh gaya aapka.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Right sir, main concern samajh gaya aapka. Bilkul samajh gaya. Main aapko WhatsApp number main aapka save kar de raha hu Rakesh ji aur main aapko timely screenshots vagerah share kar diya karunga regarding this buylead. Iske baad bhi aapko koi issue face hota hai ya notification ka issue face hota hai to aap mujhe bata sakte hai. Ek meri request hai aap se jab bhi mere se call end ho jaaye, call ke baad apna play store mein jaake ya app store mein jaake jis jis jis bhi phone mein apna IndiaMART ki application use kar rahe hai usko update kar lijiyega ya to app store se ya play store se.
Executive: Bas update karne ke baad haan update karne notification settings aapki update ho gayi hai. Hopefully ab wo delay aapka miss out nahi hoga wo properly aapko receive hua karega. Baki main aapka number save kar liya main aapko screenshot provide kar dunga over over the time sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Okay. Iske alava koi issue sir?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Theek hai to main aapki jo ticket raise hui hai sir use close kar sakta hu agar aap satisfied hai to?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Thank you sir. Thank you sir. To main aapko ye screenshot vagerah main share kar deta hu. Ek to filhal koi buylead nahi aayi hui hai. Ki hai jaisi koi latest buylead hoti hai to main aapko update karta hu, right sir? App update kar lijiyega apne end se ek baar. Alright sir, thank you for your time.
Customer: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buylead notifications on time.

- Customer facing delays in receiving notifications.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and enabled notification settings.

- Executive will share screenshots of buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive advised to update the IndiaMART application.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to update the app.

- Executive to share screenshots of buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notifications, app update, whatsapp
